data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tarlac to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tarlac, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Tarlac, Philippines know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 342,500 people living in Tarlac, Philippines. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 263,847 people in the state of Tarlac who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Manobo, Umayamnon people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, encourage the 47,710 believers in Tarlac to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 47,710 believers in Tarlac and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 342,500 people living in Tarlac.
